net.happybrackets.controller.config

Class ControllerSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.happybrackets.controller.config.ControllerSettings

  • public class ControllerSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains settings pertaining to the plugin, stored as mappings from String keys to values. TODO Add get methods as necessary for data types other than String. Created by oliver on 26/09/16.

        public static ControllerSettings load(java.lang.String path)
        Load settings from specified location. If the location does not exist the default settings with be returned.
        Parameters:
        path - The path we are loading from
        Returns:
        The Settings

      • getDefaultSettingsLocation

        public static java.lang.String getDefaultSettingsLocation()
        Returns:
        Returns the path to the default settings file. This is currently HappyBracketsToolWindow.getPluginLocation() + "/settings".

      • clear

        public void clear(java.lang.String setting)
        Removes the specified setting from these settings (if it exists).
        Parameters:
        setting - the setting to remove

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String setting)
        Get the String value for the specified setting. Returns null if the setting has not been set.
        Parameters:
        setting - The setting name to find
        Returns:
        the setting value

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String setting,
                                  java.lang.String default_value)
        Get the String value for the specified setting. Returns defaultValue if the setting has not been set.
        Parameters:
        setting - The setting name to find
        default_value - the default value to return if not found
        Returns:
        the setting value

      • set

        public void set(java.lang.String setting,

        Set the value for the specified setting.
        Parameters:
        setting - the setting name to change
        value - the value to set it to
